Question.Subject: Is there a UK version of Etsy?
Question.Content:
www.etsy.com
Is there a UK verson, or any similar website based in the UK? (they sell handmade goods, etc, from lots of different sellers)
Thankyou
Question.ChosenAnswer: I don't know of any, but the US-based etsy site IS international. There are seller's there from all over the world -- and buyers as well. My very first sale was to a person in Spain -- and I'm in the US.

Answer.Content: I don't know of any, but the US-based etsy site IS international. There are seller's there from all over the world -- and buyers as well. My very first sale was to a person in Spain -- and I'm in the US.
